Author: FishyGuts#5085
Content:
Good afternoon.  PirateChain has completed a setup guide to run a Full Komodo Node on the open source box, The nodl.
The guide includes a PirateNode setup as well as referral links to purchase the nodl under Janes referral link.
If you wish to have your assetchain added to the ports, contact @radix42 and she will help.  Please consider a donation for her efforts, this was all done without any promise of compensation!  
Privacy is Freedom!

https://medium.com/piratechain/how-to-run-a-piratechain-and-komodo-full-node-on-the-nodl-5327c52bc7d5

Author: CrisF#3405
Content:
Hi,

I'm one of the many candidates running for election for KMD NN operator in the `EU region`.

I could really use your support and votes.

My proposal (node-9) can be found here: `https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/NotaryNodes/tree/master/notarynodes/node-9`

Please send votes to me at this address,  `RBDivEArcb7aRsYTvtN5MRnaxeDAepSNmW`

and to other candidates who support the KMD ecosystem, and need votes, at the addresses that they post.

Thanks,

CrisF
`https://node-9.xyz`

(Voting / election info:  `https://komodoelection.com/`)

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content:
Hello everyone :).
As some of you may already know, this year, I'm candidating for a node in SH region.
The past year has been very nice : I learned so much thanks to you all who supported me, it was really amazing.
So amazing that I try to contribute more and more, and to find ideas that could help the community. This led me to the creation of a project called Barterlly, and here's the true reason behind my proposal : 
I believe this app, and its future versions can be the starting point of something very useful for the community and help spread the word and attract users and devs into KMD ecosystem : Any dpowed assetchain / coin will automatically be listed on the platform (and all "derivative" ones yet to come ;) )

I won't go into tech details on this post, and will just wish you a good election time, but don't forget ! 

Support Barterlly, Vote for dwy ! : RKUV7wkP4yTR1suVYLicf4ZaooQzz8u5iR

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/KomodoPlatform/NotaryNodes/master/notarynodes/dwy/jawarrr.jpg

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content:
Hi here :).
Barterlly is now open on BETA mode, and will provide tools for users and CoinOwners to perform OTC trades in a safe way.
Any KMD assetchain dPowed will be listed, and supported, for free.
Other coins not already listed can submit a listing application at : https://barterlly.typeform.com/to/iqpS1H
During the BETA, Barterlly won't charge any fee other than the transaction ones. after the release we will charge 1% on top of every transaction.
Our goal is to provide premium tools for coins listed on the platform. (Discord swapbot, twitter integration, public orders, wallet integration, API, custom templating, and many more).
Feel free to join us on our Discord.
https://discord.gg/RHc95zw
The app link is located at : https://app.barterlly.io
We are open to suggestions, and partnerships.

See you soon !

Barterlly's team

Author: JAG#5172
Content:
Greetings,

I wanted to shoot out a message to members of the Komodo team and community to see if you would be interested in recording a podcast for my week long podcast series of the Komodo Project. 

I recorded a podcast with two Komodo team members several weeks ago and it was a big success. Many people contacted me asking to create more episodes and I would love to bring on anyone who is interested. Here is a list of topics I would like to create a podcast over, each topic would be its own podcast:

-Why Komodo is a better blockchain solution
   --Blockchain difficulties, scaling issues, problems Komodo solves, etc

-Antara
  --What Antara is, it's frame work, smart-chains, why its a superior solution, etc.

-Komodo economics
  --Token supply, POS, staking, price outlook, scarcity, etc.

- How to customize your blockchain
   --How its done, why its important, how business can adopt this solution, etc

-Blockchain Web app on AWS
   --How to use it, how business can adopt it, etc

PM me if interested or shoot me an email at drew@crusayder.com
